markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 130 1.1 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- The visages of beasts are carved into the painted wood of a beast staff, with a large head on top. When used as a weapon, the staff is a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)_. While wielding the staff while you have it prepared, you're affected by [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=293). If you have [Wild Empathy](/Classes.aspx?ID=6), you gain a +1 circumstance bonus on checks using it. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Beast Staff **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 130 1.1 **Price** 340 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_gouging claw_](/Spells.aspx?ID=920)
  • **1st** [_magic fang_](/Spells.aspx?ID=179), [_pest form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=217)
  • **2nd** [_animal form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=10), [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102)
Beast Staff (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 130 1.1 **Price** 1,400 gp **Bulk** 1 --- Used as a weapon, the staff is a _+2 striking staff_. The circumstance bonus if you have Wild Empathy is +2.
  • **3rd** _animal form_, [_insect form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=163)
  • **4th** _animal form_, [_bestial curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=670), _insect form_, _pest form_
Beast Staff (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 130 1.1 **Price** 6,250 gp **Bulk** 1 --- Used as a weapon, the staff is a _+2 greater striking staff_. The circumstance bonus if you have Wild Empathy is +2.
  • **5th** _animal form_, _insect form_, [_moon frenzy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=203)
  • **6th** [_baleful polymorph_](/Spells.aspx?ID=17), _moon frenzy_
name: Beast Staff (Greater)
